<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	NOW THEREFORE,
	in consideration of the promises of the Parties described herein, the receipt and sufficiency of which is hereby acknowledged,
	the Parties hereby agree as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-TRANSFORM: UPPERCASE; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article&nbsp;1
	- Definitions and Interpretation
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-TRANSFORM: UPPERCASE; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	References
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Unless
	something in the subject matter or context is inconsistent therewith, all references to Sections, Articles and Schedules are to
	Sections, Articles and Schedules of this Sixth Amendment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	1.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	General
	Definitions
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Unless
	the context otherwise requires, capitalized terms used but not otherwise defined herein shall have the meaning given to such terms
	in the Gas Supply Agreement or its amendments.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-TRANSFORM: UPPERCASE; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article&nbsp;2
	- AMENDMENTS to gas supply agreement
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-TRANSFORM: UPPERCASE; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Amendments
	to Gas Volume Commitments
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Parties
	agree to extend the end of the Post Winter Period 2014-2015, as defined in the Fifth
	Amendment, until May 25, 2015, being the date the Buyer Plant was shut down because of
	insufficient Natural Gas availability.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	During
	the period in which the Buyer&rsquo;s Plant is shutdown in 2015 because of insufficient
	Natural Gas availability (the
<B>
	&ldquo;Winter Period 2015&rdquo;
</B>
	),
<B>
</B>
	Parties
	hereby agree as follows
<B>
	:
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.75IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.75IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	i.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	Buyer
	shall use reasonable efforts to buy, with priority over other Natural Gas, Seller&rsquo;s Gas at a minimum average rate of 180,000
	SCM/d, calculated monthly.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.75IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.75IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.75IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.75IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	ii.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
	If
	required by ENAP, for the purpose of supplying the Natural Gas demand of cities of the Magallanes Region, Buyer shall buy, with
	priority over other Natural Gas, Seller&rsquo;s Gas to be re-sold to ENAP (&ldquo;
<B>
	Re-Sold Gas
</B>
	&rdquo;).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.75IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.75IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Seller
	has been making reasonable efforts to deliver Natural Gas at a minimum rate of 400.000
	SCM/d to Buyer, for the period from the date the Buyer&rsquo;s Plant restarts until April
	30, 2016 (&ldquo;
<B>
	Post Winter Period 2015-2016
</B>
	&rdquo;). The commencement date of
	the Post Winter Period 2015&ndash;2016 shall be the seventh (7th) day after the Buyer
	gives Proved Notice to the Seller specifying the date of the restart of the Buyer&rsquo;s
	Plant.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(d)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Parties
	agree that the Gas Volume Commitment for the period May 1st, 2015 to April 30, 2016,
	is hereby deemed to be delivered in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Gas
	Supply Agreement, according to the amendments agreed herein.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 2; OPTIONS: NEWSECTION; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">

<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage273"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Amendments
	to Take or Pay Obligations
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	For
	the Post Winter Period 2015-2016, Clause 4.3(b) of the Gas Supply Agreement is hereby deleted in its entirety and the following
	is substituted therefore:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&ldquo;(b)
	No Take or Pay quantity (&ldquo;
<B>
	TOP Quantity
</B>
	&rdquo;) shall be applicable.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	If
	Buyer&rsquo;s Plant is in operation, Seller&rsquo;s Gas will have first priority over any third party natural gas deliveries.&rdquo;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Amendment
	to Deliver-or-Pay Obligation
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	For
	the Post Winter Period 2015-2016, Clauses 4.5 (b) and (c) of the Gas Supply Agreement are hereby deleted in their entirety and
	the following is substituted therefore:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&ldquo;(b)&#9;No
	Deliver-or-Pay Quantity (&ldquo;
<B>
	DOP Quantity
</B>
	&rdquo;) shall be applicable.&rdquo;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2.4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Amendment
	to Gas Price
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Gas Price,
	as defined in Article 12 of the Gas Supply Agreement, shall be applicable for all volumes
	of Seller&rsquo;s Gas that Seller tenders for delivery up to the &ldquo;
<B>
	Base Volume
</B>
	&rdquo;
	as defined below:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	For
	the Winter Period 2015 and Post Winter Period 2015-2016, Base Volume is an average of
	200,000 SCM/d, calculated monthly.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&middot;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	For
	the period May 1, 2016 through April 30, 2017, Base Volume will be an average of 140,000
	SCM/d, calculated monthly.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	For each
	Month when the Buyer&rsquo;s Plant is in operation, for all volumes of Seller&rsquo;s
	Gas that Seller tenders for delivery in excess of the Base Volume (the &ldquo;Additional
	Gas&rdquo;), the Gas Price shall be increased by [*] per MMBtu. Notwithstanding the above,
	the Additional Gas total price shall be at least [*] per MMBtu.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	During
	the Winter Period 2015, for the Re-Sold Gas, the price payable by Buyer to Seller shall
	be [*] per MMBtu.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	2.5
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Period
	May 1, 2016 to April 30, 2017
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Beginning
	October 1, 2015, Seller may initiate commercial negotiations with other parties (&ldquo;Third
	Parties&rdquo;) for the sale of Available Gas, if the Buyer&acute;s Plant is shutdown
	for insufficient Natural Gas availability in 2016 (&ldquo;
<B>
	Winter Period 2016
</B>
	&rdquo;).
	Seller may only sell its Available Gas to Third Parties during Buyer&rsquo;s Plant shutdown
	in Winter Period 2016 under interruptible conditions. Without limiting the foregoing,
	Buyer shall always have priority to purchase all Seller&rsquo;s Gas when it is operating.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	____________________&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Certain
	confidential information has been omitted from this document, as indicated by the notation &ldquo;[*]&rdquo;. The omitted information
	has been filed on a confidential basis with the Securities and Exchange Commission pursuant to a request for confidential treatment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">

	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	3
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage274"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	If Buyer&rsquo;s
	Plant is shut down because of insufficient Natural Gas in Winter Period 2016, then Seller
	and Buyer shall make reasonable efforts working with Enap to have a sufficient market
	for the Base Volume in order to help Seller maintain a continuous operation
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	If Buyer
	re-sells Seller&rsquo;s Gas in Winter Period 2016, then Buyer shall make reasonable efforts
	to obtain the best possible price, taking into account market conditions at the time.
	The Buyer shall pay 100% of the price obtained for Re-Sold Gas to Seller. For greater
	certainty, Buyer shall not bear any cost or benefit for the Re-sold gas.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(d)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	For greater
	certainty, Buyer has no obligation to buy Seller&rsquo;s Gas during Winter Period 2016
	if Buyer&rsquo;s Plant is shut down.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(e)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Not less
	than sixty (60) Days prior to April 30, 2016, Seller shall deliver to Buyer a Gas Volume
	Commitment that covers the period of time from May 1, 2016 to April 30, 2017 and such
	Gas Volume Commitment will be deemed to meet Seller&rsquo;s obligation to deliver a Gas
	Volume Commitment pursuant to Clause 4.2 of the Gas Supply Agreement, according to the
	amendments agreed herein.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-TRANSFORM: UPPERCASE; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Article&nbsp;3-
	INVOICING AND PAYMENTS
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-TRANSFORM: UPPERCASE; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	3.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	For
	each month of the Winter Period 2015, Seller will invoice the Buyer for Seller&rsquo;s
	Gas at the Gas Price according to the GSA.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	3.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	Buyer
	shall pay the Seller for the invoiced Seller&rsquo;s Gas as follows:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	For Seller&rsquo;s Gas invoiced up
	to an including 181,528 MMBtu on or before 30 Days after reception of the corresponding
	invoice; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	For Seller&rsquo;s Gas invoiced to
	the Buyer in excess of 181,528 MMBtu, on or before December 31, 2015.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 12PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	For Seller&rsquo;s Gas invoiced outside
	of Winter Period 2015, Buyer shall pay according to the GSA invoice provisions.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

</FONT>
</P>

	Article&nbsp;4-
	Miscellaneous
</FONT>
</P>

	4.1
</FONT>

	Other
	Terms of the Gas Supply Agreement Remain Unchanged
</FONT>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	This prepayment agreement (the &ldquo;
<B>
	Agreement
</B>
	&rdquo;)
	is entered into on December 18, 2015 by:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42.35PT">
	1.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	GEOPARK COLOMBIA S.A.S.,
</B>
	a company incorporated under the laws of Colombia, with its registered
	office at Calle 94 No. 11-30 8th Floor, Bogota, Colombia (the &ldquo;
<B>
	Seller
</B>
	&rdquo;);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42.35PT">
	2.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	GEOPARK LTD
</B>
	., a company formed under the laws of Bermuda, with its registered office at
	Cumberland House, 9th Floor, 1 Victoria Street, Hamilton HM11, Bermuda with registration number 33273, (the &ldquo;
<B>
	Guarantor
</B>
	&rdquo;);
	and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42.35PT">
	3.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	C.I. TRAFIGURA PETROLEUM COLOMBIA S.A.S.
</B>
	a company incorporated under the laws of Colombia,
	having its offices at Carrera 11 No. 82-01, Of. 701, Bogota, Colombia, (the &ldquo;
<B>
	Buyer
</B>
	&rdquo;), and any of the Seller,
	the Guarantor and the Buyer, a &ldquo;
<B>
	Party
</B>
	&rdquo;, and, together, the &ldquo;
<B>
	Parties
</B>
	&rdquo;.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	WHEREAS:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42.35PT">
	(A)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Seller is engaged (inter alia) in the exploration and production of crude oil and the Parties
	on or about the date of this Agreement have entered or will enter into the Commercial Contract whereby the Seller has agreed to
	sell and deliver Commodity to the Buyer in such quantities and of such quality and for the price and on other terms and conditions
	set out in the Commercial Contract.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42.35PT">
	(B)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Buyer has agreed to make an advance payment to the Seller for export of the Commodities in
	the manner set out in this Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42.35PT">
	(C)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Subject to the terms of this Agreement, the Parties agree that the reimbursement of the advance
	payment and all other amounts owed by the Seller to the Buyer under this Agreement shall be made by way of deductions from the
	price payable by the Buyer to the Seller for the Commodities to be delivered under the Commercial Contract.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	IT IS NOW AGREED:
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">

</TD>

	1
</B>
</TD>

</B>
</TD>

	&nbsp;

</TD>

	1.1
</TD>

<B>
	Definitions
</B>
</TD>

	&nbsp;
</P>

	In this Agreement (including the recitals) the
	terms defined in Schedule 2 (
<I>
	Definitions
</I>
	) shall have the respective meanings.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 7.6PT 0PT 0.6IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

	1.2
</TD>

</B>
</TD>
</TR>

	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 31.7PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD>
	Unless a contrary indication appears, a reference in this Agreement to:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 82.9PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.9PT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 6.4PT">
	The &ldquo;
<B>
	Seller
</B>
	&rdquo;, the &ldquo;
<B>
	Guarantor
</B>
	&rdquo;, and
	the &ldquo;
<B>
	Buyer
</B>
	&rdquo; or any other person shall be construed so as to include its successors in title, permitted assigns
	and permitted transferees;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 82.9PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.9PT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 6.4PT">
	a document in &ldquo;
<B>
	agreed form
</B>
	&rdquo; is a document which is previously
	agreed in writing by the Buyer;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 82.9PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.9PT">
	(iii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 6.4PT">
	&ldquo;
<B>
	assets
</B>
	&rdquo; includes present and future properties, revenues
	and rights of every description and includes uncalled capital;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 82.9PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.9PT">
	(iv)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 6.4PT">
	&ldquo;
<B>
	certified copy
</B>
	&rdquo; means, in relation to a document, a copy
	of that document bearing the endorsement &ldquo;certified true copy&rdquo; and which has been signed and dated by a duly authorised
	signatory of the relevant company and which complies with that endorsement, or a notarised copy of that document;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 82.8PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.85PT">
	(v)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 6.5PT">
	&ldquo;
<B>
	Commodity
</B>
	&rdquo; shall, as appropriate be construed as a reference
	to the whole Commodity or any one or more Commodities that form part of that Commodity;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 82.9PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.9PT">
	(vi)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 6.4PT">
	&ldquo;
<B>
	including
</B>
	&rdquo; or &ldquo;
<B>
	includes
</B>
	&rdquo; means including
	or includes without limitation;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 82.9PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.9PT">
	(vii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 6.4PT">
	&ldquo;
<B>
	Agreement
</B>
	&rdquo;, &ldquo;
<B>
	Commercial Contract
</B>
	&rdquo;,
	&ldquo;
<B>
	Transaction Document
</B>
	&rdquo; or a &ldquo;
<B>
	Security Document
</B>
	&rdquo; or any other agreement or instrument is a
	reference to that Commercial Contract, Transaction Document or Security Document, or other agreement or instrument as amended,
	supplemented, extended, restated, novated and/or replaced in any manner from time to time (however fundamentally and even if any
	of the same increases the obligations of the Seller or provides for further advances);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 82.9PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.9PT">
	(viii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 6.4PT">
	&ldquo;
<B>
	guarantee
</B>
	&rdquo; means any guarantee, letter of credit, bond,
	indemnity or similar assurance against loss, or any obligation, direct or indirect, actual or contingent, to purchase or assume
	any indebtedness of any person or to make an investment in or loan to any person or to purchase assets of any person where, in
	each case, such obligation (including any indemnity) is assumed in order to maintain or assist the ability of such person to meet
	its indebtedness;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 82.9PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.9PT">
	(ix)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 6.4PT">
	&ldquo;
<B>
	indebtedness
</B>
	&rdquo; includes any obligation (whether incurred
	as principal or as surety) for the payment or repayment of money, whether present or future, actual or contingent;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 82.9PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.9PT">
	(x)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 6.4PT">
	a &ldquo;
<B>
	person
</B>
	&rdquo; includes any individual, firm, company, corporation,
	government, state or agency of a state or any association, trust, joint venture, consortium or partnership (whether or not having
	separate legal personality);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 82.9PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.9PT">
	(xi)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 6.4PT">
	a &ldquo;
<B>
	regulation
</B>
	&rdquo; includes any regulation, rule, official
	directive, request or guideline (whether or not having the force of law, but if not having force of law being one which companies
	operating in the same industry and jurisdiction of the applicable Obligor also customarily comply) of any governmental, intergovernmental
	or supranational body, agency, department or of any regulatory, self-regulatory or other authority or organisation;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 82.9PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.9PT">
	(xii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 6.4PT">
	a provision of law is a reference to that provision as amended or re-enacted;
	the singular includes the plural and
<I>
	vice versa
</I>
	; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 82.9PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 33.9PT">
	(xiii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 6.4PT">
	a time of day is a reference to London time, unless expressly provided otherwise.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 31.7PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD>
	Section, Clause and Schedule headings are for ease of reference only and shall not affect the construction of this Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 31.7PT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD>
	References to Clauses, paragraphs and Schedules are references to Clauses, paragraphs and Schedules of this Agreement unless
	otherwise stated and references to this Agreement include its Schedules.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 31.7PT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD>
	Unless a contrary indication appears, a term used in any other Transaction Document or in any notice given under or in connection
	with any Transaction Document has the same meaning in that Transaction Document or notice as in this Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 31.7PT">
	(e)
</TD>
<TD>
	A Default (other than an Event of Default) is &ldquo;
<B>
	continuing
</B>
	&rdquo; if it has not been remedied or waived in writing
	and an Event of Default is &ldquo;
<B>
	continuing
</B>
	&rdquo; if it has not been waived in writing.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	1.3
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Third party rights
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN">
	Except for the Buyer&rsquo;s creditors or financiers
	to whom the rights of the Buyer under this Agreement may be assigned:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 31.7PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD>
	a person who is not a Party has no right under the Contracts (Rights of Third Parties) Act 1999 to enforce or enjoy the benefit
	of any provision of this Agreement; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 31.7PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD>
	the consent of any person who is not a Party is not required to rescind or vary this Agreement at any time.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
	2
</B>
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	THE COMMITMENT AND ADVANCES
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	2.1
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	The Commitment
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 31.7PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD>
	Subject to paragraph (b) and (c) below and the other terms of this Agreement, the Buyer makes available to the Seller the Advances
	in an aggregate amount not exceeding (i) for the period from the Signing Date to and including the Initial Commitment Period End
	Date, the Initial Commitment; and (ii) for the period commencing from and including the day after the Initial Commitment Period
	End Date to and including the end of the Availability Period, the Reduced Commitment.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 31.7PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD>
	In no event shall the aggregate amount of the Advances to be Utilised by the Seller under this Agreement (when aggregated with
	all other amounts previously Utilised under this Agreement) exceed:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 86.7PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 40.05PT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 6.4PT">
	for the period commencing on the first day of the seventh month following
	the Signing Date and ending on the last day of the seventh month following the Signing Date, US$75,000,000;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 86.7PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 40.05PT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 6.4PT">
	for the period commencing the first day of the eighth month following the
	Signing Date and ending on the last day of the eighth month following the Signing Date, US$70,000,000;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 86.7PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 40.05PT">
	(iii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 6.45PT">
	for the period commencing the first day of the ninth month following the
	Signing Date and ending on the last day of the ninth month following the Signing Date,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 126.75PT">
	US$65,000,000; and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 126.75PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 86.7PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 40.05PT">
	(iv)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; PADDING-RIGHT: 6.3PT">
	for the avoidance of doubt, from and after the first day of the tenth month
	following the Signing Date, US$60,000,000 (subject always to the terms of this Agreement and in particular Clause 5.3(b)).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 31.7PT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD>
	Upon mutual agreement of the Buyer and the Seller, the Buyer may, in its sole and absolute discretion, make available to the
	Seller an additional Advance to be Utilised under this Agreement of an aggregate amount not exceeding US$25,000,000 (the &ldquo;
<B>
	Additional
	Advance
</B>
	&rdquo;), subject to the Buyer and Seller entering into amendments and modifications to the Transaction Documents on
	terms and conditions acceptable to the Buyer in its sole and absolute discretion.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 31.7PT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD>
	Subject to paragraphs (a) and (b) and the other terms of this Agreement (in particular Clause 5.3(b)), at no time shall the
	aggregate amount of the Outstanding Advances exceed the Maximum Commitment.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;
</P>
